knimeNode.name: Fingerprint Reader
knimeNode.shortDescription: Node to read fingerprints from a FPS file into an output table.

fullDescription.intro: This node can be used to read a FPS file and convert the fingerprint records into knime fingerprints. The format of the .fps file is mentioned here: http://code.google.com/p/chem-fingerprints/wiki/FPS
fullDescription.option: The location of the FPS file containing fingerprint records.

option.name: Set row IDs from fingerprint file:

fullDescription.option: Whether or not the row IDs in the output table be overwritten with the Ids read from the FPS file.
